source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 387 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.
Equip: Your damaging abilities have a very high chance to charge the magnet, up to 30 times.

Use: Reverse the magnet's polarity to violently recycle buried garbage, dealing 82,591 Plague damage to your target per charge. Lingering virulence deals 10% of the damage dealt to 5 nearby enemies over 6 sec. (20 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
